meta.project: Bubbles Enterprise - Soffit & Fascia Solutions Website

product_overview: Bubbles Enterprise is a specialized soffit and fascia contractor serving Orlando and Central Florida since 2014. The website serves to educate homeowners and builders on soffit and fascia solutions, showcase services, provide an interactive cost calculator, enable quote requests, and establish Bubbles Enterprise as the local market leader in soffit and fascia services.
core_goals: Generate qualified leads for soffit and fascia services in Central Florida
Establish Bubbles Enterprise as the authoritative brand in soffit and fascia solutions
Educate customers about the importance and maintenance of soffit and fascia systems
Showcase detailed service offerings: New Construction, Remove & Replace, Repairs
Dominate local market presence in Orlando and surrounding Central Florida cities
key_features: Homepage with hero section, service overview, and local trust indicators
Service area pages covering Orlando and key Central Florida cities
Detailed services pages for New Construction, Repairs, and Remove & Replace with builder partnerships
Interactive cost calculator leveraging WebAssembly for fast soffit and fascia cost estimation
Quote request system with property address validation, service selection, photo upload, and scheduling integration
Educational content including measurement guides, material comparisons, and maintenance tips
AI-powered chatbot integration for customer support and inquiries
Image gallery showcasing past projects with optimized carousel displays
Customer testimonials section for social proof
Admin dashboard for content and system management
Security system for AI-based monitoring and bot protection
SEO optimized with schema markup and local SEO focus
user_flow_summary: User lands on homepage and views hero section highlighting core services and local expertise
User navigates to service area or services pages to learn detailed information
User accesses the cost calculator to generate preliminary soffit and fascia estimates by selecting materials and service types
User submits a quote request through a comprehensive contact form including address validation and photo upload
User interacts with AI chatbot for instant support and answers
Admin users log into the dashboard for managing content including gallery photos, testimonials, and service details
Site visitors access educational materials and measurement guides enabling informed decisions
validation_criteria: Homepage loads within 3 seconds on mobile and desktop with proper responsive layout
Cost calculator provides accurate estimates with instant feedback and material/service selection
Quote request form validates Central Florida addresses and handles file uploads securely
SEO meets local search keyword rankings and includes schema markup
Accessibility conforms to WCAG 2.1 AA standards with keyboard navigation and screen reader compatibility
All forms and data handling comply with GDPR and CCPA privacy policies
AI chatbot responds correctly to common customer queries and escalates as needed
Admin dashboard allows secure updates to content, gallery, and testimonials
Security monitoring protects from spam and malicious activity
Cross-browser compatibility and mobile optimization verified
